sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"超过，胜过"之意。
means: surpass ： 多用以强调优点、长处、技能或质量等方面的超过。
excel ： 指在成绩、成就或学识上胜过他人。
exceed ： 既可指超出权利、权力的限度、管辖范围，或超过规定的时间范围，又可指在数量、程度或大小等方面的超过。

sentence.Network_en: He hopes one day to surpass the world record.
sentence.Network_cn: 他希望有一天能刷新世界纪录。

sentence.Network_en: One's abillity and learning surpass the average.
Young people surpass old men in strength.
sentence.Network_cn: 年轻人在气力上赛过老年人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 盈字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 长,增加〖 increase;raise〗 超过〖 surpass〗 丰满,匀称好看〖 fullandround〗.
胜字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 战胜,打败〖 defeat〗 胜过;超过〖 surpass;prevailover〗 一说通“称”。相当;相称〖 beequalto〗.
字典中祧字的解释 ... ◎ 祧 tiāo (2) 超越[ surpass] (3) 承继为后嗣[ be or become heir to].
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... （ap 成为+ ) surpass v 优于，胜过 （path 痛苦+.

list.abs: Grasp skills but surpass skills , is as to reach the altitude of true art creation ., 掌握技术而又超越技术 , 才能真正进入艺术创作境界.

the mini bangs produced by the LHC will briefly reach several times the energy density that occurs in RHIC collisions , and the temperatures reached therein should easily surpass 10 trillion degrees .LHC制造的迷你霹雳，会短暂地达到现在于RHIC产生的能量密度的许多倍，而其中的温度则应该可以轻易地超过10兆

but the returns ratio for the positive number account is generally the currency , takes refuge from danger and so on steady account , the increase scope mostly does not surpass 2 % .而收益率为正数的账户普遍都是“货币型”、“避险型”等稳健账户，涨幅大多不超过2%。

according to incomplete statistics the end of 2007 the domestic real estate enterprise's ratio of debt to net worth surpasses 80 % equally , and mostly is the bank debt .据不完全统计，截至2007年底，国内房地产企业的负债率平均超过80%，且大多都是银行债务。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French surpasser, from sur- 'above' + passer 'to pass'

entry.def: If one person or thing surpasses another, the first is better than, or has more of a particular quality than, the second.

example.ex: He was determined to surpass the achievements of his older brothers...
example.tran: 他决心超越几个哥哥的成就。

example.ex: Warwick Arts Centre is the second largest Arts Centre in Britain, surpassed in size only by London's Barbican.
example.tran: 沃里克艺术中心是英国第二大艺术中心，规模仅次于伦敦的巴比肯。

entry.def: If something surpasses expectations, it is much better than it was expected to be.

example.ex: Conrad Black gave an excellent party that surpassed expectations.
example.tran: 康拉德·布莱克举办了一次远超人们预期的精彩聚会。

entry.def: If something surpasses understanding, it is too difficult to understand.

example.ex: ...a clever and spectacularly successful system, the detailed complexity of which surpasses our full understanding.
example.tran: 一个设计巧妙且极其成功的系统，其复杂的细节非我辈所能完全理解

means.word_mean: 2. be or do something to a greater degree;

sentences.sentence: "her performance surpasses that of any other student I know"
"This car outperforms all others in its class"
"A black limousine passed by when she looked out the window"
"He passed his professor in the hall"
"One line of soldiers surpassed the other"

auth_sentence.content: The LHC was meant to surpass the Tevatron.
auth_sentence.res_content: The LHC was meant to surpass the Tevatron.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The LHC was meant to surpass the Tevatron.

auth_sentence.content: Gallus continued to surpass me at all games.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gallus continued to surpass me at all games.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gallus continued to surpass me at all games.

auth_sentence.content: It may even need to surpass that degree.
auth_sentence.res_content: It may even need to surpass that degree.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It may even need to surpass that degree.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"; 2. 表示"超过,在……上面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sur在下面;随后+rept爬+itious……的→在下面爬→鬼鬼崇崇的
sur超过,在……上面+plus多余;加→多出很多
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
surround[v.包围]+ing表名词→被围起来的状态→环境
sur超过,在……上面+charge费用→额外的收费→附加费
sur超过,在……上面+realism现实主义→n.超现实主义
sur超过,在……上面+veil面纱+lance→在面纱上看[隔了一层纱]看→临视
sur超过,在……上面+viv生命+al表名词→经过事故活着→幸存
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
sur在下面;随后+round圆圈→在下面围一圈
sur超过,在……上面+mount山→在山上→登上
sur超过,在……上面+pass通过→在上面通过→超越

Sentence.sentence: No physicist is likely to surpass Einstein in the next 200 years.

means.word_mean: 超过; 优于; 多于; 非…所能办到

sentences.cn: 他比他的所有对手都强。

sentences.en: The beauty of the scenery surpassed my expectation.
sentences.cn: 该处风景之秀丽超出我的预料。

sentences.en: The results surpassed all our expectations.
sentences.cn: 结果比我们期望的都好。

jushi.english: The results surpassed all our expectations.
jushi.chinese: 结果比我们期望的都好。

jushi.english: The modesty of this approach was surpassed only by its success.
jushi.chinese: 谦虚朴实的态度只有通过事业的成功才显示出它的可贵。
